page.title: 13Farming in Alburgh
page.content:
{ Farming { _______ The whole area is reliant on arable farming as it's chief source of income. Cereal crops are by far the most important, but sugar beet for the East Anglian factories is also widely grown. Other crops include peas, broadbean and maize for cattle fodder and oil seed rape. Much large machinery can be seen in the fields in the planting, nuturing and harvesting of the crops, and is listed below:-
Tractor Forage harvester Plough Combine harvester Drill Peaviner Sprayer Sugar beet harvester Elevator Baler
